categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire
Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Hamar was a male Sith, one of the rare non-Force-sensitives of his species, who served as a supply officer for Imperial Intelligence of the Sith Empire during the Cold War.

Hamar first appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a level 50 Battlemaster PVP Gear vendor. He was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
